interpretation: The "face with thermometer" card signifies illness and physical discomfort. It suggests a need to take care of one's health and well-being, and to seek medical attention if necessary. This card may also indicate a temporary setback or obstacle that requires patience and self-care to overcome. The presence of this card in a reading may suggest a need to slow down and prioritize rest and recovery. Associated keywords include: sickness, health, recovery, self-care, patience, obstacles.
